CustomField.description: This score - High, Medium, or Low Risk - predicts the likelihood of a firm paying in a severely delinquent manner (90+ days past terms) over the next 12 months, based on statistical models and payment information in D&B's commercial database.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This score - High, Medium, or Low Risk - predicts the likelihood of a firm paying in a severely delinquent manner (90+ days past terms) over the next 12 months, based on statistical models and payment information in D&B's commercial database.
CustomField.label: D&B Prescreen Score (call D&B)
